verbs.description: It [V: does] n't take a lawyer to know Donald Trump 's longtime fixer Michael Cohen is in a boatload of trouble , but a J.D. sure is helpful to figuring out what kind of trouble . Former federal prosecutor Renato Mariotti has a brief look in USA Today at ...
